job_description:
Business Development Manager – Reverse Logistics
Location: Remote, United States
Salary: $80,000 - $150,000 base + commission

Are you interested in partnering with leading brands and manufacturers providing a full suite of value add, reverse logistics services? Could you achieve more in an organisation already delivering services to over 10% of the Fortune 500 list? If you are interested in joining an organization that matches your ambitious growth plans then please read on!

As the driving force behind our client’s continued growth, you'll be targeting OEMs, Retail and EMS organisations to secure new bids and tenders in Repair/Reverse Logistics. Supported by the backing of a global leader in this space with over 100 facility locations and 15k employees, you will be hunting and uncovering new opportunities, helping to craft and deliver compelling proposals, and closing deals.

Responsibilities:
• Identify and engage new clients
• Manage a pipeline of deals with an average individual deal value of $200K - $1M
• Drive new business sales as a proactive hunter
• Develop and deliver compelling proposals
• Convert proposals in to revenue
What’s in it for you?
• Significant financial rewards upwards of $180k-$200k on target earnings
• The opportunity to join a high performing team and established global organization with a huge projected rate of growth in the US
• Fully remote working with business travel US wide

What will you need to be successful?
• Previous experience of selling repair/reverse logistics services
• Capable of operating as an individual contributor and delivering against targets

Qualifications: Previous experience of selling repair/reverse logistics services
Capable of operating as an individual contributor and delivering against targets
Responsibilities: Manage a pipeline of deals with an average individual deal value of $200K - $1M
Drive new business sales as a proactive hunter
Benefits: Significant financial rewards upwards of $180k-$200k on target earnings
The opportunity to join a high performing team and established global organization with a huge projected rate of growth in the US
Fully remote working with business travel US wide
